events.message: The customer reported an auto collision involving their vehicle on May 9, 2024, requesting to file a claim for damages sustained.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning vehicle collision and damages to the car.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the claim to assist the customer throughout the investigation and settlement process.
Customer was contacted to confirm receipt and acknowledgment of the filed claim regarding the recent vehicle accident.
Request sent to the customer for submission of accident report, photos of vehicle damage, and police report if available.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the accident report, photos of the damaged car, and repair estimates.
Investigation initiated by claims department to verify incident details, assess damages, and validate all provided documentation.
Investigation successfully completed confirming the vehicle collision cause and extent of damage matches submitted evidence.
A settlement amount has been proposed to the customer based on repair costs and policy coverage after thorough evaluation.
Customer confirmed acceptance of the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling and communication.
Claim approved by the claims manager following customer’s agreement to the settlement terms and verification of all requirements.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and issued to the customer’s bank account as per agreement.
The claim case has been officially closed following successful payout and confirmation of customer satisfaction with final resolution.
All claim documents and communications have been archived securely for record-keeping and future reference if necessary.
